[00:00.00]Nevada (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:07.05]Lyrics by：Kentrell Gaulden/Thomas Horton/David Boonpetch
[00:14.11]N***as dyin' fallin' stars through the night
[00:17.43]And I been thinking about you every night
[00:20.60]If you happy I know that I should be alright
[00:23.94]'Cause this tragic and I can't seem for to decide
[00:26.58]
[00:27.12]And I think I just I should leave I just
[00:30.33]Should I leave it 'lone I
[00:32.57]
[00:33.58]Should I try or just I can't lie I just
[00:36.83]I be wanting for to cry
[00:39.40]But I'm caught up with these hoes they gon' follow
[00:42.32]Ballin' like a baller blocka
[00:44.32]Every time I catch my feelings lock 'em in a bottle
[00:47.60]And you probably find my heart somewhere lost in Nevada
[00:50.46]
[00:52.84]Don't know who I want you the one I want oh
[00:55.50]
[00:56.05]Never said I don't that's that money talk oh
[00:59.29]Drunker than a skunk it go down in the room
[01:02.51]Choppas in the trunk baby this that slime tone
[01:05.82]But I need yo love like right now baby ooh
[01:09.03]I'm not on no drugs not right now it's the truth
[01:12.27]I apologize for you looking like a fool
[01:15.40]I can't hold you right now
[01:16.35]So I been holdin' on my tool
[01:18.70]I don't want my ex I don't want no b***h I had
[01:22.03]I just want a chance hopefully I make you glad
[01:25.26]If you turn me down tell the truth I just might spazz
[01:28.20]If who around laugh I just probably bust they a*s
[01:31.40]
[01:31.96]And I think I just I should leave I just
[01:35.22]Should I leave it 'lone I
[01:37.44]
[01:38.47]Should I try or just I can't lie I just
[01:41.68]I be wanting for to cry
[01:43.84]
[01:44.42]But I'm caught up with these hoes they gon' follow
[01:47.19]Ballin' like a baller blocka
[01:49.16]Every time I catch my feelings lock 'em in a bottle
[01:52.40]And you probably find my heart somewhere lost in Nevada Nevada
data.trans:
[ti:Nevada (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:Nevada (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:07.05]//
[00:14.11]有人奄奄一息 犹如流星一般划过夜空
[00:17.43]每晚我都想念着你
[00:20.60]如果你过得幸福 我知道我应该会一切安好
[00:23.94]因为这是一场悲剧 我似乎无法做出决定
[00:26.58]
[00:27.12]我想我只是应该离开
[00:30.33]我是否应该视而不见
[00:32.57]
[00:33.58]我是否应该尝试一番 我无法说谎 我只是
[00:36.83]我想要大哭一场
[00:39.40]但我跟这些女人纠缠不休 她们如影随形
[00:42.32]就像混迹街头的暴徒一样招摇过市
[00:44.32]每当我五味杂陈时 我都将喜怒哀乐埋藏在心底
[00:47.60]你也许发现我的心在内华达州迷失方向
[00:50.46]
[00:52.84]不知道谁是我渴望拥有的人 你是我梦寐以求的那个人
[00:55.50]
[00:56.05]从未说过我无法做到 这就是所谓的金钱无所不能
[00:59.29]醉倒不省人事 我在房间里沉沦
[01:02.51]汽车后备箱里放着枪 宝贝 我用黏人的语气讨你欢心
[01:05.82]但此时此刻 我需要你的爱 宝贝
[01:09.03]我没有吞下药物 至少现在没有 这是千真万确的
[01:12.27]我很抱歉 让你看起来像个傻瓜一样
[01:15.40]现在我无法拥你入怀
[01:16.35]所以我一直拿着我的武器
[01:18.70]我并不想念我的前任 我并不想念我交往过的女人
[01:22.03]我只想拥有一次机会 希望我能让你开心
[01:25.26]如果你拒绝我 说实话 我可能会暴跳如雷
[01:28.20]如果身边的人开怀大笑 我可能会狠狠教训他们一顿
[01:31.40]
[01:31.96]我想我只是应该离开
[01:35.22]我是否应该视而不见
[01:37.44]
[01:38.47]我是否应该尝试一番 我无法说谎 我只是
[01:41.68]我想要大哭一场
[01:43.84]
[01:44.42]但我跟这些女人纠缠不休 她们如影随形
[01:47.19]就像混迹街头的暴徒一样招摇过市
[01:49.16]每当我五味杂陈时 我都将喜怒哀乐埋藏在心底
[01:52.40]你也许发现我的心在内华达州迷失方向
